title: Lalpa ram lak tumin khawvelah hian
lyrics:
Lalpa, ram lak tumin khawvelah hian,
Kei ka kal zel ang, ka phurrit nen;
Ka phatsan lo vang che, ka Lal Isu,
Hmelma doral lian mah se.

Gospel hmangaihin ka pen zel ang,
Gospel hmangaihin ka pen zel ang,
Ka Lal duhawm hming mawi hi tanin,
Ka zam lo'ng, khawvel hmaah.

A hnathawh chhunzawm zel tur tu nge awm?
Kei hi min thlang ta, ka Lal Isuan;
Lawm chungin Lalpa rawng ka bawl ang a,
Thih thlenga rinawm turin.

Ka hmabak tih tur min lo buatsaih ta,
Gospel la hmangaih lo hruai turin;
Sual ral liante chu ka tawn zel ang a,
Min hruainah ka kal ang.

Aw hmangaihna, aw hmangaihna chuanin,
Min tir chhuak ta che, khawi ramah pawh;
Muanna awm lo, ram rehah pawh hianin,
Ka kal zel ang thim mah se.
